member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bug report is hidden in the UI if a dimension filter is not specified. This is recommended for automated or high volume reports.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bug report is temporary. Temporary bug reports are short lived and not queryable.

member.summary: Gets or sets the summary.

member.name: P:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.UserReportPreview.Thumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets the thumbnail. This screenshot will be resized by the server if too large. Keep the last screenshot small in order to reduce report size and increase submission speed.

member.summary: Sends a bug report to the server.
member.param: The progress callback. Provides the upload and download progress.
The callback. Provides a value indicating whether sending the bug report was successful and provides the bug report after it is modified by the server.

member.summary: Takes a screenshot.

member.summary: Takes a screenshot.
member.param: The source. Passing null will capture the screen. Passing a camera will capture the camera's view. Passing a render texture will capture the render texture.

member.summary: Updates the bug reporting client, which updates networking communication, screenshotting, and metrics gathering.

member.name: M:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClient.UpdateOnEndOfFrame
member.summary: Updates the bug reporting client at the end of the frame, which updates networking communication, screenshotting, and metrics gathering.

member.name: M:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClient.WaitForPerforation(System.Int32,System.Action)
member.summary: Waits for perforation, a boundary between measures when no screenshots are in progress.

member.name: T:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClientConfiguration
member.summary: Represents configuration for the bug reporting client.

member.name: M:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClientConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClientConfiguration.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The maximum event count. This is a rolling window.
The maximum measure count. This is a rolling window.

The number of frames per measure. A bug report is only created on the boundary between measures. A large number of frames per measure will increase bug report creation time by this number of frames in the worst case.
The maximum screenshot count. This is a rolling window.

member.name: M:Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.UserReportingClientConfiguration.#ctor(System.Int32,Unity.Cloud.UserReporting.Client.MetricsGatheringMode,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The maximum event count. This is a rolling window.
The maximum measure count. This is a rolling window.

The number of frames per measure. A bug report is only created on the boundary between measures. A large number of frames per measure will increase bug report creation time by this number of frames in the worst case.
The maximum screenshot count. This is a rolling window.

member.summary: Gets or sets the frames per measure.
